subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The appointment of chief executive Scott Blackmun and president Larry Probst to two international commissions signals that U.S.O.C. officials have made inroads with the I.O.C.
snippet: The appointment of chief executive Scott Blackmun and president Larry Probst to two international commissions signals that U.S.O.C. officials have made inroads with the I.O.C.
